libraries.name: twoFunctionLibrary
libraries.source: var twoFunctionLibrary = (function() {var GLOBAL_VARIABLE = 'GLOBAL_VARIABLE'; function functionWithParams(one, two) {console.log(one+two)}; function functionWithGlobalVariable() {console.log(GLOBAL_VARIABLE)} return {functionWithParams: functionWithParams, functionWithGlobalVariable: functionWithGlobalVariable};})();

libraries.name: oneFunctionLibrary
libraries.source: var oneFunctionLibrary = (function() {function functionWithPrivateFunctionCall() {privateFunction();}; function privateFunction() {console.log('oneFunctionLibrary.functionWithPrivateFunctionCall')} return {functionWithPrivateFunctionCall: functionWithPrivateFunctionCall};})();
